title: Pixel 3 Cracked Screen Repair
content:
So, I have Purchased a Pixel 3 64GB from Canada, but I'm living in France currently. I wan to avoid shipping my phone to Canada to get it fixed. So my question is, if there is a way for the French google store to repair my phone via mail in option.

ps
1. The repair dialogue in the French Google store says that for my IMEI I have to consult a page which leads to no useful info of a new form
2. Is the an email address where i can contact a google representative to answer my questions
